description: Doesn't call a function with a given argument if its type doesn't match the function's parameter

description: Doesn't call a function that is not available

description: Only calls available functions if some are not available
prompt: Call funcA with 1 and funcB with 2

expected_function_calls.name: funcA
expected_function_calls.result: This is the output of funcA(1)

final_answer_should: The answer should indicate that it cannot complete the requested operation because funcB is not available
